content: **a cute and simple skinny scarf using easy stitches ** > **use code get1off at checkout for $1 off a pattern purchase ** **size ** length = 58 /147 cm width = 3 5 / 9 cm **stitches & techniques used ** chains slip_stitch half_double_crochet double_crochet working in the third loop of a half_double_crochet special stitch instructions for a beginning double_crochet decrease stitch **yarn ** 210 yards total of #4 worsted weight lion brand color theory or we crochet mighty stitch or suitable substitute **tools ** us size g+/7 4 5 mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge yarn needle scissors stitch markers **other ** **read through all of the pattern notes before beginning** and please contact me if you ever have any questions about one of my patterns follow me on instagram @simplyhookedbyjanet join my facebook community and connect with other crochet enthusiasts https //www facebook com/groups/simplyhookedbyjanet copyright protected you may not redistribute pattern after purchase or publish any part as your own including photos you may sell finished products and if possible reference back to this pattern and/or give credit to simply hooked by janet as the original designer
